name: Omniverse machina
description:
First person shooter with raycasting engine.

You are in a secret complex for the development of new technologies. You are one of the volunteers for the human cryofreezing program. You should have been defrosted after 10 years and after waking up you feel that something is wrong around you. There are only hostile machines around. You need to figure out who or WHAT is behind this.

Game was developed with PixelGameEngine 2
